availableRooms.title: Double Bedroom
availableRooms.description: We can accommodate 1-2 persons in our double room (queen size bed). The room has air condition and satellite TV, a private bathroom with hot water, private balcony with chairs, a hammock and beach views.

availableRooms.title: Family Bedroom
availableRooms.description: We can accommodate 1-4 persons in our family rooms (matrimonial bed and bunk bed). The room has air condition and satellite TV, a private bathroom with hot water, private balcony with chairs, a hammock and beach views.

availableRooms.title: Penthouse Suite
availableRooms.description: We can accommodate 1-4 persons in our penthouse suite (double queen size bed and 2 single beds). The room has air condition and satellite TV, a living room and small kitchen space, private bathroom with hot water, private balcony with chairs, hammocks and beach views.
